radiographic_examinations.findings: Consolidation with volume loss at the right lung base; no pleural or pericardial effusion; hypoattenuation of the blood pool compatible with anemia. No focal liver lesion; stent noted within the common bile duct without intrahepatic bile duct dilation; gallbladder distended without wall edema or stones. Large rounded non-enhancing area in the pancreatic head compatible with necrotizing pancreatitis, minimal residual pancreatic tissue, and associated inflammation extending to the stomach and duodenum. Nonocclusive thrombus in the splenic vein and main portal vein.
